00037 /*
00038 *       A statistics object: calculation of confidence intervals
00039 *
00040 *       ConfidObj x {: LEVEL=0.99};
00041 *               // LEVEL of confidence, default: 0.95
00042 *
00043 *       Commands:
00044 *
00045 *       void    x->Add(double)          // add a value
00046 *       int     x->Len                  // get current # of values
00047 *       double  x->Val(int)             // get a value (1 ... Len)
00048 *                                       // do not export: values-pointer may change!
00049 *
00050 *       void    x->Flush                // flush all values (Len := 0)
00051 *
00052 *       double  x->Mean                 // mean
00053 *       double  x->Var                  // *empirical* variance
00054 *       double  x->Lo                   // lower bound of convid interv
00055 *       double  x->Up                   // upper bound of convid interv
00056 *       double  x->Width                // Up - Mean
00057 *       double  x->Lo(double)           // level given, may differ from LEVEL
00058 *       double  x->Up(double)           // level given, may differ from LEVEL
00059 *       double  x->Width(double)        // level given, may differ from LEVEL
00060 *       double x->FairInd               // Fairnessindex (Jain)
00061 */
00062 
00063 #include "defs.h"
00064 
00065 //tolua_begin
00066 class   confidObj: public root {
00067   typedef       root    baseclass;
00068 public:
00069   confidObj();
00070   ~confidObj();
00071   void add(double v);
00072   void flush(void) {nVals = 0;}
00073   int getLen(void) {return nVals;}
00074   double getVal(int i){return values[i];}
00075   double getMean(double *pv=0);
00076   double getVar(double *pm=0);
00077   double getLo(double);
00078   double getUp(double);
00079   double getWidth(double);
00080   double getMin(void);
00081   double getMax(void);
00082   double getFairInd(void);
00083   double getCorr(int, int);
00084   //tolua_end
00085   void  calcConf(double, double *, double *);
00086   double studentDist(double, int);
00087   void meanVar(double *, double *);
00088 
00089   double *values;
00090   //tolua_begin
00091   double level;
00092   int nVals;
00093   int vectLen;
00094   enum  {vectGran = 10};
00095 };
00096 //tolua_end
